channel.title: Xtrascape need help
channel.description:
Hey i need help with my client and server
1. I cant change the client tittle 2. Nobody can connect to my server 3. where do i go to change what a NPC drop? 4. where do i change stats of a item?

item.title: Xtrascape need help
item.dc:creator: @xtrascape-4ever xtrascape-4ever
item.description:
@xtrascape-4ever wrote:

Thank you

and b4 i had like 20 players online normally but now, nobody can connect and i dont have edited anything…

Read full topic

item.title: Xtrascape need help
item.dc:creator: @dragon_boy dragon boy
item.description:
@dragon_boy wrote:

Make sure your compile Works, in Framesub… Change the current name…
Changing item Bonuses Item.cfg
Monster drops? This is strange because the file could be located anywhere… so check the whole file… But it is Npcdrops.cgf - In deltascape Related sources it is located in the Config Folder…
People will only be able to connect to your server if all the settings are correct… Has somebody ever been able to get on before? If they are using a client… Does it work? If they are using an ip is it the correct one?.. all the obvious stuff…

Hope This helped - Dragon Boy

Read full topic
